subject: Economy
question_en: What is the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in terms of USD?
question_hi: भारत की ग्रॉस डॉमपेट (GDP) के लिए USD में क्या है?
explanation_en: As of 2021, the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) of India in terms of rupees is approximately Rs. 2,800,000 crore. The correct answer is option A.
